bzh.plealog.bioinfo.ui.sequence.event

Class DPatternEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • bzh.plealog.bioinfo.ui.sequence.event.DPatternEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class DPatternEvent
extends EventObject
    This is a pattern matching event fired by the PatternSearchFacility.
    Author:
    Patrick G. Durand

    • Method Detail

      • setEntireSequence

        public void setEntireSequence(DSequence seq)

      • getEntireSequence

        public DSequence getEntireSequence()
        Returns the full sequence displayed in the viewer.

      • getMatchFrom

        public int getMatchFrom()
        Returns the position corresponding to the beginning of the matched region. Returns -1 if nothing is selected. Value is absolute, so use the DSequence DRulerModel to get a sequence coordinate.

      • getMatchTo

        public int getMatchTo()
        Returns the position corresponding to the ending of the matched region. Returns -1 if nothing is selected. Value is absolute, so use the DSequence DRulerModel to get a sequence coordinate.

      • setMatchFrom

        public void setMatchFrom(int selFrom)

      • setMatchTo

        public void setMatchTo(int selTo)
